ul.li: The document information is whatever information can be extracted from the binary document. The definition is shared between this resource and the document resource
The document information doesn't change once created - only the entry content, such as subject and availability, is updated
In XDS, a full information.versionId is required
Should this indexing function be limited to documents, or is there value in being able to index other types of records?

div.p: For further information, see the XdsEntry resource
